shot.primary_lens: Zeiss Supreme Prime 35mm T1.5, focus on hands
shot.composition: Medium close-up, rule of thirds, subject slightly off-center
shot.camera_motion: Sequence 1 (0-8s): Handheld documentary style, slight breathing movement, subtle final push-in. Sequence 2 (8-12s): Smooth transition to wider establishing shot, then slow push-in to capture detail and emotion. Sequence 3 (12-20s): Final close-up with subtle dolly movement, ending on a confident, impactful frame.

wardrobe.jacket: Immaculate white chef's jacket, embroidered black collar
wardrobe.apron: Navy blue oilcloth apron, tied at the waist

sequences.primary_motion: The chef performs the precise finishing of a signature dish (careful plating of a sauce or herb), his hands are the focal point.
Building on the initial action, the subject demonstrates additional aspects and benefits. The movement becomes more fluid and confident, showcasing expertise and comfort.
sequences.camera_follows: Wider shot revealing more context, then pushing in for detail

sequences.primary_motion: The subject concludes with a moment of satisfaction - a knowing smile, a final appreciative glance, or a confident gesture that conveys success and approval of the result.
sequences.camera_follows: Close-up on emotional response and final impactful moment

scene.location: Professional gourmet restaurant kitchen (brushed stainless steel, clean surfaces)

layout.walls: Brushed stainless steel walls, utensil shelves in blurred background

environment.background: Light steam rising from a distant pot, blurred activity of kitchen assistants
environment.temporal_progression: Environment remains consistent throughout the 20-second narrative. Background elements may subtly shift focus as camera moves, but spatial continuity is maintained for coherent storytelling.

lighting.primary_source: Soft directional light (softbox) coming from the right, simulating a kitchen window
lighting.evolution: Lighting remains consistent throughout the 20-second sequence, maintaining the established mood. Subtle adjustments in intensity during the final 6 seconds to emphasize the emotional climax and create visual impact.

color_grading.palette: Warm and saturated tones (gold, brown, red) for the dish, cool tones (blue, gray) for the environment

audio.ambient: Background noise of professional kitchen (clinking utensils, whispers, extractor hood)
audio.foley: Sequence 1 (0-8s): Clear and precise sound of tongs placing the element, slight scraping of spatula on marble. Sequence 2: Additional environmental sounds, subtle interactions with objects, breathing, fabric movement. Sequence 3: Final satisfying sound (smile, exhale, object placement), ambient fade.
audio.music: No music, only natural ambient sound The score builds progressively over 20 seconds, starting subtly and crescendoing toward the final moment. Emotional peak at 14-18s, then resolving with a confident, memorable final chord at 20s.

visual_rules.frame_purity: without text overlays, logos unless branded, no subtitles, hyperrealistic quality
visual_rules.realism: Hyperrealistic rendering of products with visible premium finishes. Commercial lighting highlighting key features. Precise material textures (wood, metal, glass, plastic). Selective depth of field directing attention.
visual_rules.continuity: Consistency in product presentation and staging. Maintenance of retail ambiance and brand identity. Continuity of commercial lighting and signage. Smooth purchase journey and discovery.
